dialogue.title: ai:Good_Morning
dialogue.text: Good Morning Derek! It is time to wake up.

dialogue.title: ai:Feeling
dialogue.text: How are you? Aren't you feeling great today?!

dialogue.title: ai:Reassure
dialogue.text: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in - Bill Bradley. Oh, what inspiration to start the day!

dialogue.title: ai:Motivate
dialogue.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world - Harriet Tubman.

dialogue.title: ai:News
dialogue.text: How about hearing today's news?

dialogue.title: ai:Snippets
dialogue.text: Egypt's President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi said on Friday he will run for a second term in office in an election in March, which the former military commander is widely expected to win. Now turning our gaze to southeast Asia, Myanmar was making final preparations to take back the first batch of Rohingya Muslims who had fled conflict in troubled Rakhine state, state media said on Saturday, despite growing doubts about the plan among refugees and in the United Nations. In religious news, Pope Francis issued a ringing defense of the people and the environment of the Amazon on Friday, saying big business and 'consumerist greed' could not be allowed to destroy a natural habitat vital for the  entire planet. And meanwhile,  for off in New Zealand, the Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern said on Friday she was pregnant with her first child, prompting an outpouring of support from women's rights groups and labor activists as she declared 'I'll be a prime minister and a mum'.....      interesting developments... hmmm...

dialogue.title: ai:Song?
dialogue.text: Fine. Would you prefer your favorite music instead?

dialogue.title: ai:Last_Night
dialogue.text: Last night was fun! But I think you had one too many beers. Yes, Derek. 10 is not just a little bit.

dialogue.title: ai:Shower_1
dialogue.text: So you might want to look into those documents that Kristin emailed you last night. They have all the data you requested about parking space usage segmented by neighborhood.

dialogue.title: ai:Shower_2
dialogue.text: And by the way, it's Kemal's birthday today. Don't forget to wish the boss man!

dialogue.title: ai:Showered_Enough?
dialogue.text: Don't you think you have showered long enough?

dialogue.title: ai:Great
dialogue.text: Very good Derek! Did you know, a 5 minute shower uses 100 litres of water, but with a reduced-flow showerhead less than half is used. Good thing we have the reduced-flow!

dialogue.title: ai:Alright
dialogue.text: That's alright. But did you know 2.5 billion people around the world don't have access to improved sanitation? I'm glad we can enjoy a shower with clean, fresh water. But maybe you should stop now?

dialogue.title: ai:Seriously!
dialogue.text: Okay seriously! You have showered enough!

dialogue.title: ai:WHO
dialogue.text: According to the Joint Monitoring Programme report of WHO and UNICEF 844 million people don’t have clean water! And you feel the best use of it is to drain it.

dialogue.title: ai:Benjamin
dialogue.text: When the well's dry, we know the worth of water – Benjamin Franklin.

dialogue.title: ai:Dashing
dialogue.text: Yes! You look very charming! Perhaps you want to hurry up though? You are running late for work.

dialogue.title: ai:Drive?
dialogue.text: You sure you want to drive to work?

dialogue.title: ai:Blame
dialogue.text: Your call! But don't go around blaming me for your tardiness like last time.

dialogue.title: ai:Carbon?
dialogue.text: You'll be adding greenhouse gases to the atmosphere that all of us have been striving to reduce. You sure you want that Derek?

dialogue.title: ai:Bus_Umbrella
dialogue.text: Great! If you run out the door you'll... no! Forget the coffee. It's bad for you anyway. Remember the diarrhea it caused three weeks ago? Let's get going before we miss the bus. Oh, and don't forget your umbrella.... you're welcome!

dialogue.title: ai:Car
dialogue.text: The car is only meant for emergencies and... oh... so you're not going to heed my advice? I see. This will go down in your report. Nope. Too late. Drive along now!

dialogue.title: ai:Not_Happy
dialogue.text: Just so you are aware, they are not going to be happy with your behavior.

dialogue.title: ai:Finally
dialogue.text: Finally! Talked some sense into you! Now let's grab that bus before we miss it! Oh, you forgot your umbrella. Nevermind! Keep going now. You're late. A little rain won't do you any harm.

dialogue.title: ai:Not_Understand
dialogue.text: I'm sorry! I didn't quite get that. Could you repeat that again?

dialogue.title: ai:Unacceptable
dialogue.text: That is not an acceptable response. It is best being definitive in your decisions.
